short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: forces you to tweet before scrolling

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Most people consume 1000x more tweets than they produce. Me included. Use this extension to force yourself to produce a little more content!

This extension will block you from scrolling on Twitter until you write a Tweet, after which you'll have 15 minutes to scroll before getting re-blocked.

This is an open-source extension. See the code here: https://github.com/pranavnt/twitter-temperance
